remarks: Reverse closure for an operation value, analogous to ~ afvvv .  In contrast to ~ ovrcl , elementhood of the operation's value in a set is required, not containing an element.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 26-May-2017.)
statement:
aovprc.1 $e |- Rel dom F $.
aovrcl $p |- ( (( A F B )) e. C -> ( A e. _V /\ B e. _V ) ) $.
